hypothesis_content.title: Intraday VWAP Deviation Reversion for BTC
hypothesis_content.statement: During neutral or bear regimes, when BTC price deviates by more than 1.5% from the intraday Volume-Weighted Average Price (VWAP) calculated from the daily open, it will revert toward VWAP within 6 hours with high probability.
hypothesis_content.rationale: VWAP serves as a key reference for institutional execution. Large deviations in non-trending regimes often attract algorithmic flows that trade against the deviation, as many execution algorithms target VWAP.
entry_conditions: Regime is NEUTRAL or BEAR (not BULL or STRESS)
Deviation occurs between 2-8 hours after the daily open (UTC)
No major scheduled macro news within next 6 hours

exit_conditions.take_profit: Price returns to within 0.3% of VWAP

hypothesis_content.falsification_criteria: If deviations >1.5% from VWAP continue expanding more than 40% of the time in neutral/bear regimes, indicating VWAP is not acting as a strong magnet for price.
